targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(month) AS "time",
  amb_temp,
  stations.name as metric
FROM monthly_values INNER JOIN stations ON monthly_values.station_id = stations.id
WHERE UNIX_TIMESTAMP(month) BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo()
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(month)
